title: Stopped praying for 3 months Started praying now. Was he kafir during those 3 months assim al hakeem
transcript: so my question is if a person was not praying for 3 months but he used to pray before that and he started praying again so my question is is he a cfir because he didn't pray for 3 months and who caresan um who cares as long as he's praying now alhamdulillah he's a Muslim Aban yes who cares I um my friend have a okay tell him she says who cares as long as you pray now ask Allah for forgiveness repent show remorse and never do this again
